table_headers.Status: Completion status indicator showing whether expert has provided custom distribution parameters (✓) or is using default values (○)
table_headers.CANOLA_PCT: Type of crop or vegetation being studied in this scenario
table_headers.SPORACLE: Total area of the field or study site in hectares
table_headers.Distribution Parameters: Combined baseline and treatment distribution parameters. Baseline represents outcomes without intervention, treatment represents outcomes after applying intervention. Treatment values should be ≤ baseline values.
table_headers.Confidence: Certainty level (50-100) - higher values create a more peaked distribution around the mode, indicating greater confidence in the estimates
table_headers.Actions: Available actions for this scenario including duplicate and delete options
table_headers.Yield (t): Total expected yield for the entire field (tonnes)
table_headers.Scenario: Unique identifier or name for this scenario

distribution_parameters.Min: Minimum possible value - the best-case scenario or lowest expected outcome
distribution_parameters.Mode: Most likely value - the peak or most probable outcome of the distribution
distribution_parameters.Max: Maximum possible value - the worst-case scenario or highest expected outcome
